website_summaries.verdict: With prominent, spring-loaded massage balls, these sandals can take some getting used to but will provide a deep and targeted massage.
pros: Larger nodules target individual acupressure points
Spring-loaded design delivers varying degrees of pressure depending on weight distribution
Major pressure points are conveniently labeled
Owners rave about how good they feel after wearing these
cons: Some may find them too painful to wear long enough to see any benefits

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from Plantar fasciitis and have tried creams, night splints,socks shots anything you could think of. I came across these slippers looking for more solutions so I decided to give them a try. I have to be honest they HURT like crazy when they on, but when you take them off it's a relief and am not talking about from wearing the shoe but from the Plantar fasciitis. I have been using them for 2 days so let's see how they work after a few weeks. They are good in my book. Wear it with a thick sock until you have used them for a while that helps with the pokey feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mrz.Kay

customer_reviews.title: Helps my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: They hurt like a mother when you just start using them. But once you're used to them, it's actually awesome how well they dig in. Definitely helpful for my plantar fasciitis. Sizing is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jaki M

customer_reviews.title: go slow, let your feet adapt, you'll crave wearing them soon enough
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals, but i will tell you there is an adjustment period. As a runner, my feet take a pounding and these provide just the right amount displacement pressure around my foot pad to drive away the running pain. The short story is that these sandals will hurt for the first few times you wear them so go slow, let your feet adapt. Soon you'll be craving them.
customer_reviews.author: William J Laffin

customer_reviews.title: Afterwards it is like a
customer_reviews.text: When you start to use the sandals it hurts a bit the sole of the foot, but that is what you get used to. Afterwards it is like a massage
customer_reviews.author: EDWIN PALACIN

customer_reviews.title: Hurts So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Acupressure Foot Massager Sandals and was a bit skeptical when I put them on and the pressure of the stones really hurt my feet as I suffer from plantar fasciitis and a heel spur. I walked around for 15 minutes as instructed and they kept hurting..........a lot, but when I took them off, my feet felt wonderful. I would highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my headaches & Sciatic pain
customer_reviews.text: Not as painful as others mentioned in reviews, but I do have a high pain tolerance. Since wearing the shoes (15min a day)my siatic pain and headaches have gone in addtion to other pains. When I stopped wearing them they all came back. Everyone's different and the shoes may help or not or vary in results. It sort of sounds like you're walking on legos when wearing them. The nodes have small springs in them. The shoes come with a few replacements
customer_reviews.author: Lunaomo Nyan

customer_reviews.title: Just NO
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this got any positive reviews. First of all, these do not relieve pain they cause pain. Soooo uncomfortable. I got these as a gift for my dad and he likes these kind of things but even he thought they were ridiculous. Returned immediately. Also the directions were in English but didn't seem like they were written by anyone who spoke English... Maybe by Google translate.
customer_reviews.author: Alena Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: and she seems to love it. She says it relaxes her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and she seems to love it. She says it relaxes her. I tried it, and it does take a couple of times to get used to prickling your foot. If you have real sensitive feet, it might not feel good to you.
customer_reviews.author: Vinster

customer_reviews.title: No PAIN, No GAIN
customer_reviews.text: I slipped them on thinking, I have been in labor, I have got this! I went from the living room to the kitchen ensuring the pain. I don’t walk bare foot due to plantar fasciitis. I wasn’t sure I was going to make it back! The pain was no JOKE! After a week or so, my feet were feeling better and these slippers are not excruciating to wear. Stick to it, it gets better.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: ... my feet smooth after wearing for a month I love the massage points and making my office life better ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my feet smooth after wearing for a month I love the massage points and making my office life better than before. My back pain is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Yonghoon Kim

customer_reviews.title: That is bad ...
customer_reviews.text: his slipper was a disaster for us, I bought it for myself and my husband. We use a whole month. We thought the excruciating pain would pass. That in a few weeks we would see the benefits. But it was a disaster. Lots of pain, even knees that had not appeared. I stopped using it for 01 week and I'm better, taking Osteo Biflex to heal faster. It was horrible for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia de Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: they work wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! I purchased the ones with the jade in them. I use them with socks, but noticed a considerable difference in my posture and a decrease in my hip pain and lower back pain using these every day. I would highly recommend them to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Pain free in minutes
customer_reviews.text: The first couple minutes can have you wondering what the hell you are thinking. Just keep walking and before you know it, you will be forgetting about your pain. The pressure points are fantastic. I have all over body damage and pain from chemo and steroids. Most of that pain is nerve damage in my feet. Sometimes it is bad enough to make you want to scream. One day, I wondered why there wasn’t a shoe that would massage while I walk. I put in a few key words on Amazon and boom, there they were. For the price, it was worth the gamble. I won.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Meier

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great reflexology shoes but my husband says they are noisy. lol. Its true, they are but I don't care. You only wear them for a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Runs Small, Even for Large
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 which is between sizes and as recommended I ordered the larger size which was still slightly small for me. The strap although adjustable does not hold the sandals in place very well. The nubs near my toes then didn't sit directly on my toes and I got an occasional pinch from sliding out of place. The comments about the pain are also true. Wearing socks helped, but after spending 10 minutes walking with these I couldn't determine if the massaging actually helped my feet or if it was just a relief to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain is OK, it is not bad thing
customer_reviews.text: This slippers are not normal slippers. I call it CURE SLIPPERS. The reason I call it this way is it tells the hidden illness you may have with your body parts. If you do not feel pain, you are in perfect health. The more healthier the less pain you feel when you wear the slippers. The best way you wear this slippers is you have a foot massage illustrator, you can reference where you feel most pain on your foot that reflex which part of body unhealthy. Further more, you can use the slippers as your foot massager to help you CURE.
customer_reviews.author: kathy yin

customer_reviews.title: Feel like they are doing something good
customer_reviews.text: I have bone spurs. I'm also on my feet alot. I have to say, after trying these today (without socks, I might add), for the instructed 15 mins, I definitely enjoyed how my feet felt afterwards. I think it's all relative, but in my case, my pain isn't excrucitating, but uncomfortable alot of the time. You know, bone spurs, like something's poking out of your foot? These really felt good on my foot. I was more of the attitude, "Bring it on!". I want to feel something. I think these deliver everything they claim they do. Really cool invention. I always rub my feet in the acupressure points and this goes one better.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure someone likes these...
customer_reviews.text: It's almost impossible to walk in them. Very painful. The springs are stiff. They are ok to scratch an itch if you sit down and don't put too much weight on them. They are not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Wingman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband since he has plantar fasciitis he only used them while sitting and is working his way into standing in them. He also has Parkinson’s so his muscles get stiff and rigid. He loves these and is really excited about working into walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and I don't Get that
customer_reviews.text: Made my feet hurt even more. Sorry but I couldn't recommend them. Already threw packaging out so can't return. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: rita lane

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would help my feet problems and they are certainly interesting! But they really hurt my feet so bad to stand and try to walk in them that I gave up on them. Actually gave them to my daughter to see if she liked them and could wear them. I know you have to get used to them but I couldn't
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Byriver
customer_reviews.text: They are really uncomfortable. I can’t be in them for no longer than a few seconds if that. I definitely can’t walk in them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bought it again...dang dog. Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals hurt when you first use them but just 15 minutes a day toughened my feet. I had achy feet and it worked great for that! They could assist with those who go "earthing" to replace during the winter months. My dog got a hold of my other pair so I had to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but painful.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stand my whole weight for long (180 pound), and I can definitely not wear them to walk normally. These are a good idea, but it hurts my feet more than it feels good. I still gave it a few stars because if i lean on something and just have my feet slowly go up and down it can feel goot. Furthermore they are sturdy and come with replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: emilie

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one and a different type one made of stones ... returned the stone one. This sandals ... hands down. These plastic small cylinder attached to this sandals are like little buttons. Pressed down to every step, as if someone is giving me a pressure points. Totally not meant for public, but for a house item. It’s not very appealing, in my opinion to be wearing in public is one... and as far as pain, it does hurt , but the good hurt feeling. Not meant for walking distances. Reason for me to say , it’s more for home slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan Truong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them at least 20-30 per day. Still building up to wear them longer. The first week or so I could only wear them about 10 minutes while walking around and longer while sitting and movingy feet around in them. They definitely help me with some chronic health problems I have.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina V. Linares

customer_reviews.title: Foot massage feels now less and less painful after use and feet feel rejuvenated
customer_reviews.text: They are not for casual use or daily walking. It is definitely a device to use as directed. Given that, after a few days of use I can feel the benefit of being more balanced and my feet and the rest of the body feels more aligned. Foot massage feels now less and less painful after use and feet feel rejuvenated.
customer_reviews.author: coffee

customer_reviews.title: An AMAZING investment in my health😀
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. These work great for me. I have nerve damage and pain in my legs due to a motorcycle accident which makes it hard and unstable for me to walk. These, though painful to wear for long periods of time, in just a week, have helped tremendously to release all the above-mentioned ailments. Sometimes I walk in them, sometimes I just stand and wiggle on them, either way, they "hurt so GOOD". PS delivery was prompt Great investment in my health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG. No way
customer_reviews.text: OMG..I didn't expect they would do much, but wow !! They hurt like hell to walk in them!! I walked about 15 feet and my feet hurt so bad, it was great to get them off.. totally worthless!!
customer_reviews.author: chris taft

customer_reviews.title: not exactly comfortable, but effective
customer_reviews.text: These shoes -- socks required -- are rather like shiatsu. Not comfortable while wearing (so far, in the first few days, no more than 15-20 minutes at a time, and all indoors), but my feet feel thoroughly massaged after wearing. I'm sure I'll get used to them as i build up the time of wearing, but I hope that won't make the massage less effective. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for the brave
customer_reviews.text: These slippers seem very hard and tough on my feet, at least the beginnings are very difficult. Was wearing them only for several minutes the first day and yet felt pain in the evening to the point I would not wear them the following day. I am a bit overweight so perhaps it is tougher on me. Hope will get used to them slowly easing in. In the meantime have to use other type of massaging slippers.
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: Relief in 4 days after battling with pain for my entire 20 year career
customer_reviews.text: These slides did more for my plantar fasciitis in 6 days than army doctors did for it in 20 years. Stick with it and be unconventional with them. Wear them while sitting down and stand periodically. The more it hurts the worse off your feet must be. I went from pain to gain in just 4 days and I don’t need 50 warm up steps in the morning. These should be issued to soldiers, no weapon more important than your feet.
customer_reviews.author: E.D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are heaven. I get strong reflexology foot massages regularly and these sanders just hit all the right spots. Great for pain, improves mood and relaxation while I’m walking around my house. I’m standing better too ! I love my heels and my feet thanks me when I wear these when my stilettos come off. If you are sensitive and don’t get your feet worked on regularly, stick with these sandals! They provide so many various health benefits. I am also a massage professional and these make me so happy! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: purchased many for gifts
customer_reviews.text: You can't/shouldn't wear these very long but they do the trick when I come home from a long day and my feet hurt. I put these on while I'm cooking dinner and when I take them off I feel some relief in my feet. Not easy to walk in but they aren't walking shoes :)
customer_reviews.author: HoneyK

customer_reviews.title: Cheddar News
customer_reviews.text: I saw these on a Cheddar news commercial. Based on my personal test and results. If I'm not hydrated from h20 the knobs are rough piercing the soles of my feet. If I drink 64 to 72 oz of water, and make sure I have Castor oil on my soles and heels, personally I can wear them for a while before they become uncomfortable. I sprained my lower back in Hs, I've been feeling some tingling in that area and it feels good and taking pressure away, the sandals are doing others things as well. This review are my results.
customer_reviews.author: E & J

customer_reviews.title: Already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I received this product less than a week ago, have been wearing them intermittently while at home. I will say that they do provide some welcome relief, however I am disappointed that after only a few days the caps are falling off the "buttons" and I question how long these sandals will last. It should be noted that the product does include a few replacement buttons but if I end up having to replace them at one per week those will not last very long. I will try to update this review after a few months or more to say whether or not the sandals have worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bare Root

customer_reviews.title: A+ Quality/ Designed
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase these sandals are really really good. I wear them for 10-15 minutes you can fill feet nerves. Then I take them off soak my feet in cooled , warm water. Then I repeat couple of times though out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jak Black

customer_reviews.title: Hurt enough to try.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be helpful, yet only after a brief second of starting to walk; very painful full on the heels. The toes did feel a quick second of relief, yet was too hurtful to even begin to walk. I would recommend for a younger generation (like in their twenties) than older generations that the feet are more sensitive. Various different attempts but not something I would gift or suggest; unless you've gotten stronger stamina.
customer_reviews.author: Beatlemetx

customer_reviews.title: They do hurt at first.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being very loud "clicking" and somewhat flimsy, they do the job of getting the soles in shape. I used to walk on gravel barefoot to do the same thing, but this is preferred. As with anything, it hurts for the first several days, but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: kqifnrvybggd

customer_reviews.title: instead of pain relief, it's just pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my dad, but both he and my mom think the massaging part is too stiff and hard and actually hurts their feet more than helps. My dad sometimes uses it to walk in the backyard for like 2 minutes before he takes them off. I tried them and I rather not use them at all.. Sure they're easy to use but the cheap ones at the Chinese supermarket feel better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hurt and my podiatrist said they don't do anything to help my plantar fasciitis (which is what they were advertised for). Unfortunately, pain makes people desperate to try anything, so I did. My advice is not to fall for this one. There are better ways to find relief, but it does take time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says it would do
customer_reviews.text: Love these flip flops. I have had mine since last year. They have greatly helped with my plantar fasciitis, and with now working from home I can wear them all day. I decided to write a review as I intend to order a second pair, as the first pair has gotten quite old. If you have any pain in your feet, don’t hesitate in buying these flip flops as it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the brown jade spring slippers and they arrived extremely fast. I wanted these because I love really hard foot reflexology massages, but I can't get them as often as I would like as they can be pricey. I wear these around my place as regular slippers and they do an incredible job. I definitely can feel them getting deep knots in the bottom of my feet. They also make me feel really relaxed and I believe help my energy flow more freely. I would recommend these to anyone into this type of thing.
customer_reviews.author: j.r.15

customer_reviews.title: What’s your prediction for the fight?  Paaiinnnn! Rocky III
customer_reviews.text: When conventional medicines, apparatus and treatment provide minimal relief try these. As noted by many others expect pain when using. Thankfully the pain diminishes after some use. Instructions say 15 minutes per session so don’t exceed. Walk slowly. Use socks. My shoe size is 13 so the largest size is just slightly small but I took a chance and it is worth it. I’ve used for only two days but have positive results. Will update when possible. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: EastOfTheRoclies

customer_reviews.title: Hurts at first then your chakras open
customer_reviews.text: Felt like rocks and was walking like a zombie for a few days. But now I'm chilling and it feels a lot better. Its a meditative pain exercise at first but like three days and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing foot massagers!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing foot massagers! When I first tried them they hurt so bad that I had to hobble slowly. I wear them every day & have built up to 30 minutes a day. My plantar fasciitis is completely gone! And I feel & sleep better when I use them. I’m so glad I found them! Give them a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Verified product
customer_reviews.text: The material is look cheap plastic but its work for my foot pain. My size shoes is 6.5 Fit perfectly. I am wearing with the socks. Must wearing daily for couple hours or more to improve relieve your foot pain getting better and good for foot circulation.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Painful but provides relief
customer_reviews.text: Okay, first of all these are not for people with a low pain tolerance. I recommend starting with socks and only wearing it for five to ten minutes at a time until you get used to it. As far as pain relief, my feet are less sore. Also, I have lower back pain and that seems to lessen after awhile. I also have cervical neck pain and I feel a little better afterwards. That may be a placebo effect, but it seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Singla

customer_reviews.title: Straps over foot need to be adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bottom of these slippers because they give my feet a nice massage. I can still feel the effects after I take them off. However, I would have preferred the strap to be adjustable. I found mine to be too tight over the tops of my feet. That caused my foot not to be able to slide all the way in and I wear a medium size shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenates my feet
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be decently made, not great, but decent. They are not for wearing all day but wear well for short periods of time. My wife and I each have a pair, and we don't consider ourselves tender footed people . As such, they do not hurt our feet at all. The first couple days, they feel a little unusual but after that they are just fine. I like the way my feet feel after wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Make it Hurt so Good:)!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals: they provide such an interesting and rough but therapeutic massage/workout to the soles of my feet. I feel like I’m grinding into my Plantar Fascitis, giving it the finger, and making it cry when I wear these suckers. They hurt but it’s a really good achey deep massage kind of hurt and with time you adjust to it. Highly recommended! Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: Swiss2012

customer_reviews.title: Tired feet....Gone
customer_reviews.text: Yeah you have issues with hurting in the beginning but the next day you dont have any pain...wear everyday for the past week and I'm actually walking faster at work. So far so good 👍
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these painful sandals. I’ve been having foot pain for 2 months and was trying to avoid the Dr. I put on thick socks and wear these 15-20 minutes each day and they have worked wonders. Hurts like hell while they are on, the relief after they are off is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mrsv865

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using a week I got the jade stone ones. I tried with and with out socks . Per previous reviews I agree socks help. But overall all even with out it wasn’t unbearable to do 15 min. You can definitely feel it on points where there is tension for me in the heels and noticed after just a few days the upper area of my foot that had first had some tension in it when wearing the shoes was not really there so I’ll continue wearing seeing if the pain in the heel betters. Overall I think it’s great I bought a second pair for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Taylor

customer_reviews.title: acupressure was developed before acupuncture!
customer_reviews.text: I felt that once I got used to the initial discomfort, the pressure points actually have a very beneficial effect on my entire body, I like them slot, you have to put up with a little discomfort for another a week of daily use, it may take some people longer, but you should notice the benefits after you are at ease with the pressure applied to the bottom of your feet, for me I felt a VERY relaxing calming sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Total body massage.
customer_reviews.text: I am suffering from plantar fasciitis of my right heel. I had a cortisone injection but it failed and I am back with the pain. These shoes were recommended by a friend to wear to relieve the pain. I wear them as per the instructions, 15 minutes then take them off. I notice a big difference. The pain eased a lot. I try to wear them daily to build up a tolerance. Yes they hurt at first but it gets better. I wear compression socks during the day which have helped as well. The great thing about the shoes is that they help your entire body, the art of reflexology. I feel great afterwards. Total body massage. Love the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CAMYSNO1MOM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: They do what I wanted -- helped to increase circulation to my feet, and alleviate the numbness (peripheral neuropathy) that I was experiencing in my toes and surrounding areas on the soles of my feet. Yes, the first time I wore them they were quite uncomfortable, borderline painful. But if you start with 1 minute a couple times a day, you can gradually (every other day or so) increase the time and build up to 15 or more minutes a day. Some days it still is a tad uncomfortable if worn first thing in the morn, but that soon passes. Other times: no discomfort at all; quite stimulating. Bottomline: they are working. Feeling has returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else have said they are painful but the benefits outweigh the pain. I have tender feet and it was rough the first week. I suffer from muscle tightness in my calves, hamstrings and glutes. After a week i have noticed the muscles have not been nearly as tight and actually feel like they have lengthen. Which has helped with lower back and hips. I hope for continued success.
customer_reviews.author: GMANN

customer_reviews.title: These are a love, hate sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are a love, hate sandal. It kills to wear it, but if I don't my foot is worse. However, I can't wear for very long. It helps to wear socks with them. I'm glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Can highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Okay, you have to get used to them but once you do, I just love how my feet feel. I am on my feet a lot so when I come home they ache. I wear these flip flops for about 15 min and my feet feel so good afterwards. They do hurt in the beginning, don't give up, once you get used to it they are wonderful. I would not recommend if you have very sensitive feet though
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Paoli

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to understand how to use them; they are very good!
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much. Yes, as other reviews, they did hurt a little when first starting out, but after one understands how to use them properly they are great. Just have to figure out for yourself (my opinon) what's best. They definitely provide relief and I use many times every day. You can use them with no socks or 1-2 pairs depending what kind of foot massage you'd like for yourself. Sometimes I'll have no socks on and just stand and rock back and forth or a pair of socks and walk around a bit. These are not something you wear to the store; I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas gift and my parents love them. I think I will be ordering me ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift and my parents love them. I think I will be ordering me a pair now 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: I can see why these slippers might not be suitable for everybody, but they are great for me. I bought a more advanced version that has lego-looking elements on it. After walking in them for 5-10 minutes and shifting my weight around to get different zones stimulated, and I am talking about really walking and embracing the discomfort, I walk on another mat which has many plastic needles on it. The combined effect makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: len182

customer_reviews.title: Painful. Uncomfortable. Showed no results at all.
customer_reviews.text: If i wanted that much pain, i would just got outside and walk on jagged stones. Same feel on both feet. Honestly, i feel like some of the parts weren't pressing in. I feel it did nothing for me at all but hurt. Just being honest.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Seems comfortable enough
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered the next size up. They fit perfectly. I added my own touch. Some might call it art therapy. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Purplelist

customer_reviews.title: So helping
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get relief form my heel pain. I currently use hard insoles to help my Plantar Fasciitis but started feel discomfort so I looked something different to help me. So before I went back to my Doctor I wanted to try this product and I read the reviews and it sounds like work. I will say it is uncomfortable at first to walk with this product with socks on but I only used them for a short period of time each day. I have to say even after the first day it has helped me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like pebbles on a mechanical keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a mechanical keyboard for your feet. These aren’t particularly attractive. They do come with replacement “keys.” I don’t use them regularly. My boyfriend has these and a roller and prefers the roller. These do make a clicking sound like a mechanical keyboard would. These are not comfortable to walk in but I don’t think they’re intended for walking. I’m a size 11 in women’s shoes and have fat feet and these fit me comfortably, in terms of shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Author Sable Sylvan (Heather Davies)

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals but beware
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sandals but you have to beware that when you first put them on they are going to hurt your feet. I could only put them on and stand up for about 1 to 2 minutes the very first time I tried them. After a week or so I can put them on for about 5 minutes and now I am closer to 10 minutes. I don't see anyone actually replacing their sandals with these for the purposes of just walking around at home. I consider these more of a therapeutic sandals for those who want to activate the healing points in their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Z Castle HQ

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I debated which version (intensity level) to get, but am glad I purchased the most intense one. I was concerned when so many reviews said they were painful. With socks on, these were just right therapeutically. I like the jade stone accents. I wish they weren’t an ugly color, but they are to be worn in the home so that doesn’t really matter. I was concerned they wouldn’t fit my narrow feet, but with the adjustment it actually accommodates that enough which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Felt like I was walking on rocks on my bare feet
customer_reviews.text: Ouch! These hurt like he**!! I was so excited to get these but once I put them on my feet I was so disappointed. First of all, these were much too big. They don't fit a size 5 foot. Then when I stood up and tried to walk I couldn't. I couldnt walk even 3 minutes without feeling like I was walking on rocks in my bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: VShorty

customer_reviews.title: Relieved foot pain and the effects lasted
customer_reviews.text: These have helped my feet immensely! I’m often on my feet on concrete surfaces for 10-12 hours a day. Before getting these I was changing my shoes/orthotic inserts at least once a day and would still have foot cramps after about 8 hours of working. I’ve been wearing these for 5-15 minutes a night at home and after a week of using them my foot pain has drastically diminished. I don’t even have to wear them everyday now after owning them for a month. They will be painful if your feet are already sore/cramped, but I found that each consecutive night they became more and more comfortable and now when I wear them there’s no ache.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Cason

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: Problem with these shoes is the little buttons pop in and out and it’s just noisy, and not very comfortable, cheaply made too so it feels like they will break right away.
customer_reviews.author: Rasika Leue

customer_reviews.title: Gets out aches & pains
customer_reviews.text: Oh, how l love these. First thing l look for when l get up or when l come home. They are on my feet every second when l’m home. They are comfortable, but l do wear socks with them. They feel like a foot massage with every step. Really gets the aches & pains out of ur feet. Pretty-no, but beneficial yes!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I don't have a comparison
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt really sure how to rate it because being uncomfortable might be the only way to make the acupressure actually work. It doesn't do any good at all whatsoever though if it is too uncomfortable to use. I bought it as a gift for my dad for his birthday, but returned immediately after he tried them on because there was no way he was even going to try to use them because they hurt so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Does helps with pain.
customer_reviews.text: So far they work good. As ones said, wear with socks until feet get use to them it help my sore shins in a couple of days. I walk 5 mins a day with socks so far.
customer_reviews.author: lynn graham

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These were a late night - Couldn’t sleep purchase. Forgot I bought them until they showed up. Super glad I stumbled upon these. I wear them a few minutes everyday and while they do hurt when you wear them my aches and pains in my feet/ankle feel so much better after wearing these. Liked them so much my husband ended up getting a pair too.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Foot relief - not for the tender footed`
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my feet and legs ache horribly after a 12 hours nursing shift. These little buggers were so painful at first, I could not even wear them 30seconds at a time. But I have been consistently working with them and the amount of relief I feel in my feet and being able to wear / walk in them for about 10-15 minutes at a time now, has made a big difference in how my feet feel. I like these!
customer_reviews.author: donna rae fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are well made, effective and affordable. I received them, put them on, and tried them out by walking around the house and they are a perfect fit. They really help stimulate the soles of my feet. They are impressively made. I imagine the more I wear them, the more comfortable they will be, once my feet get used to them. I'm a tenderfoot and that may be the reason I can really benefit from them, since my feet don't usually get such a great work out as these sandals offer. Thank you, for your innovative foot product!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I threw them away after wearing one time! Miserable feeling! Cheaply constructed! Don’t purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalogal

customer_reviews.title: No tenderfoots
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches and very tight muscles in my feet as a result. These slippers are a huge relief. I do have tough feet as a result of years of foot cramps, so I found the pressure comforting , though my heels got tender the quickest. My mother had sensitive feet and can’t step on a pebble, so I know these won’t be for everyone, but I think they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing great reviews, hoping for relief from plantar fascitis. I kept trying to ease myself into them, but it feels like you're walking on a rock bed. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable even when you’re heavy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable, I’m pretty heavy and the other shoes stated not recommended for heavy people, these were said to be ok for heavier people and I would agree, they’re comfortable to wear around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying out
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this really helped anything. At the beginning, it definitely made me stand up straight. It clacks a lot when I where it around the house (hard wood). Sometimes when I wear it in the morning, it kind of hurts. For some reason though, it’s my favorite pair of house slippers I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, uncomfortable, silly.
customer_reviews.text: Like many folks I wanted to try to reduce some foot pain and so I figured I'd try these things for $20. Having spent a good 5 minutes in them, I was able to appreciate them to their fullest extent. Further appreciation should be military in nature. My wife took one look at them and I could see the words "divorce" flash behind her eyes. Just ask yourself this: "What could be more comfortable than standing on some hard plastic knobs with some springs underneath them?" The list of answers is several thousand entries long and I would advise you to just go see a foot doctor.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: After few days of use, my lower back pains are gone!
customer_reviews.text: These do take some getting used to, but I've hung in there. After a few days of use, I noticed that my chronic lower back pains were gone. I'm very pleased with that outcome. Thank you Byriver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is reflexology, not beach shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hey y’all, read the description they’re NOT comfortable shoes. They’re reflexology treatment and you are not gonna go stroll on the beach with them. That being said, by the second day I am up to 10 minutes wear time and my plantar fasciitis is feeling better! Wear thick socks, wear them a few minutes at a time and build up tolerance. I also use them when sitting at a desk...slip my feet in and roll them around, rock them back and forth, rub them...it feels wonderful. I think the sandals are well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Guinevere101114

customer_reviews.title: ByRiver Reflexology shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, very well made. Requires gradual increase in duration of use. Don’t try 15 mins at first. Just start with 2-3 minutes and work your why up as your feet adjust to the pressure points. I recommend this product. Note: one size shoe does not work for all size feet.
customer_reviews.author: A S.

customer_reviews.title: For working people
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else has said, upon first wearing them they hurt. But after soldiering through it, when I took them off, my feet felt SO MUCH BETTER!!!! I’m on my feet for 10-14hrs a day. And I cant even explain the difference these have made. They basically give your feet a hardcore massage. I recommend wearing socks while having them on. They are hard to walk in, so I wear them while I’m standing washing dishes, or in the shower before bed. I’m so glad I took a chance on these
customer_reviews.author: NaturalistaB

customer_reviews.title: helping nerve pain in feet
customer_reviews.text: Takes so time to get used to but gave to a friend with nerve issues and she was very happy - might take a few days to get used to the barbs... but stick with it for best results.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: Effective and worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This came in two days! Fast shipping despite being in what I call, covid times. Super happy with the product. I kept shoes on and walked all around the home like house slippers for at least 20 minutes. I only wish the pressure points were more firm. My feet are constantly inflamed these days and this felt great and relaxed my entire body right away. The only thing I saw strange was the product had smudges, possibly re-sold and shipped from a customer who returned item. I can’t wait to use these sandals tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and I stand on my feet the majority of the day. These definitely hurt sooo good... meaning it takes some time to get use to but really helps workout the bed of the foot. These couples w/ compression socks have helped relieve me of foot pain and lower back pain... definitely wear socks to initially break them end.
customer_reviews.author: QB

customer_reviews.title: Funny little enjoyable sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are funny sandals, and I like them. I can't wear them for very long. I tend to wear them while I am putting on my makeup in the morning or when I get home from work for a few minutes. I like the pressure on my feet. They penetrate deeply and I enjoy that. After I wear them my feet have an energy flow to them they didn't have before.
customer_reviews.author: JC.   Flower

customer_reviews.title: Decreases pain of PF
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these around the house has made a world of difference in my plantar fasciitis! My pain has decreased 90% overall!
customer_reviews.author: Kah

customer_reviews.title: Feels fine right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of massage shoes from this company. These are soft on the touch and able to walk in them with no discomfort whatsoever. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This Slippers Hurt so good.....
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and love them. I have sore feet and these are amazing and hurt in a great way while I wear them. When I take them off I feel so relieved. Just wearing them in short intervals now. I am a big guy, so these buttons are getting a workout also! Can’t wait to get used to them!!
customer_reviews.author: TripleBypass

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits, wear it, to each his or her own.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry, but these slippers are not what I thought that they would be. Somehow you knew that they would not be gental on the feet and gave me a heads up via the email to wear thick sox until I could get use to wearing them. They hurt my feet too much for me to ever get use to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great for Plantar Fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for plantar fasciitis and/or sore feet. I’ve been dealing with plantar fasciitis for about a year now and have not been able to cure it with stretching, rest, la cross balls, etc. I’ve been walking around for about a half hour a day with these things bad my plantar Fasciitis is practically gone. If you have PF and can’t find relief, you should definitely try these before getting steroid injections.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd slippers for this type. I got so use to the first one and lost any reaction with it, so I decided to buy another one with different made. This pair is pretty good. I like how the knots are press-able. It is very true to size. I really like it and it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: painful horribly painful
customer_reviews.text: i feel great after wearing these simply because my feet stopping hurting. the best thing about these is taking them off. if you have any pain put these on and you will soon forget that pain because your feet will hurt so bad nothing else will matter.
customer_reviews.author: Russell W. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend - follow instructions- it has released most of my pain and only have small discomfort but as I continue using , it’s getting much better. Following instructions will benefit you.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

product_meta.title: BYRIVER Acupressure Foot Massager Acupoint Massage Ball Roller Slippers Shoes Reflexology Sandals for Men Women(BS)
feature_bullets: ✔RELIEF: Designed to soothe foot/ heel pain & tension due to arthritis, neuropathy and other ailments. Great healthcare relaxation gifts for your family, friends.
✔RELAX: Refreshes sore, achy, plantar fasciitis feet. Promotes better blood flow to enhance overall health.
✔Accessories: Package included 5pcs replacing massage buttons. 3 months FREE exchange for non-deliberate damage.
✔QUALITY: Made by environmental friendly materials. 100% QC CHECKED before packing.
✔SIZE: Considerable strap design to adjust the slippers width. If you are between sizes, take larger one.
